borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt">The proposed garage for reasons of size, scale and siting would result in an increased sense of overbearingness and a harmful loss of outlook and daylight to the occupiers of 17 and 17A Horace Avenue, therefore, constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to: -</span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012);&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">- Policies DMD1 and DMD6 of the Draft Local Plan (Regulation 19 Consultation version, October 2020)</span></p>

<p style="text-align:justify"><span style="font-size:11pt">The proposed garage for reasons of sitting will appear overly dominant within the street scene harmful to the character and appearance of the road, dwelling, terrace row and the surrounding local area, notably given the location of the application site within the Becontree Estate. As such, the proposed development is contrary to: -</span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">-&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 14.6667px;">National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF) (DLUHC, 2021)</span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">- Policies D1, D4, and D8 of the London Plan (March 2021)</span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">- Policy CP3 of the LDF Core Strategy (July 2010);&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">- Policy BP11 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011);&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">- The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012);&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="font-size:11pt">- Policies SP2, DMD1 and&nbsp;DMD6&nbsp;of </span><span style="font-size: 14.6667px;">The London Borough of Barking and Dagenhamâ€™s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission Version, December 2021)</span></p>
description: A Retrospective planning application for the garage at the rear land of 17A Horace Avenue - Resubmission of 21/01054/FULL
